title: Alex "A Rod" Rodriguez: The Greatest Cheater in Sports, Relationships and Real Estate?
description:
Alex Rodriguez (aka A Rod) used to be considered one of the greatest baseball players of all time, but he’s had a few unceremonious falls from grace to jeopardize that title.  Tune in to hear about his most recent scandal that could cost him millions of dollars, which comes on the heels of his public breakup with J Lo!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
